lines.text: You know what you are, Laura?
You're one great big ball of bitch.
Sometimes I think that the dream is reality and life is the simulacrum.
Oh, this is gonna be a marathon. I'm gonna wear a number on my back, and people are gonna have to bring me cups of water.
Milk, milk, lemonade. Around the corner fudge is made.
Do what I say, and don't be an idiot.
Yeah, I think I've seen pictures.
Yeah, he's not a photogenic man.
Did you have to say that?
I'm sorry, Dad, but you know there were two ugly guys in the photo. One was you, one was David Stanick.
My appetite is too good. I just want to eat everything.
